div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo
die mensis augusti anno quo supra

Eodem die Andreas lousone per confessione lingue propre conuictus fuit pro
perturbio Alexandri torne famuli cristinj prat Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Dauid Anthone conuictus fuit per assisam Jurati ex ore Johannis
Cullane prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio cristinj prat Et Idem cristinus conuictus
fuit per dictam assisam pro perturbio dicti Dauid et quolibet alteri emendabit
vt Jura volunt

Eodem die Andreas lousone deuenit plegius legalis per manus ostendum quod
cristinus prat et sui familiares erunt Indempnes pro Dauid Anthone
aliter quam per viam Juris Et thomas lammyntone deuenit plegius legalis quod
dictus Dauid erit Indempnis pro dicto cristino et suis familiaribus aliter quam per viam Juris
et quilibet ipsorum Obligantur ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes

The saide day the borghe' fundin be Donalde baxtar se one gilbert of
tulidef / for the wranguis' ourbying of him Anent certan quhet was
fundin availe for the quhilkis the saide gilbert was in Ane amerciament
of the court et cetera

The saide day it was deliuerit and ordanit be ane suorne assis' that
gif ony of the flessaris makis ony trubulance tile vthiris and beis conuict
tharof sale pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werkis vnforgevin

Eodem die Johannes Cullane deuenit plegius legalis quod gilbertus tulidef
erit Indempnis pro Donaldo baxtar aliter quam per viam Juris Et thomas Waus
deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Donaldus erit Indempnis pro dicto gilberto aliter
quam per viam Juris et quilibet obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes
de huiusmodi fideiussione et cetera
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene xxiij die mensis Augusti anno quo supra

The saide day Williame gray Wattirman grantit to releiwe Johne auchnewe
and Dauid Srathin of ix lax and ane quartar barrell of grils' at the handis
of Dauy Steuart

The saide day Jonhne ros' grantit that he hede offendit gretlie to
William futhes in hevy and wranguis' rehers' for the quhilkis he askit
the saide William forgiwnes one his kneis and dischargit and quietclamit'
the said' William of al clamys and gudis now and foeuere Ande grantit
to pay the saide Williame the money and gudis tane fra him

The saide day thome Douglas grantit him aving to Dauy stevart ix lax
and ane fyft part of ane barrel of grils' quhilkis the saide Dauid Remittit
him for x s' to be pait be the fatht of his bodie to the saide Dauy be
Sonday cum viij dais

The saide day the aldirman ballieis and the personis of consale present for the
tyme grantit to gif license to the franchmen to sele ther' wynis
batht in Smale and gret as It ples' thame best

Eodem die Dauid colp conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore
Andreas tulidef de eodem prelocutoris huiusmodi assise pro perturbio Agnetis
andirsone relict' quondam gilbertj Kintor Cuj emendabit ut Jura
volunt Et cristina turin dicta Agnes quita de perturbio cristine
turing matris prefatj Dauid per dictam assisam ex ore dictj
prelocutoris

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vndecimo die
mensis Septembris Anno quo surpa

The said day Jhonne fendour wricht was quyt of the hous' maile ande
brekin done' of the wale of ane hous' follouit be thome gledstane be ane suorne
assis' malcum crag forspekar And the said thomas was fundin awinge
to the said' Jhonne' ane french' crovne of gold' quhilk he lent him

Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvijo die
mensis Septembris Anno quo supra

The saide day comperit charlis stevinson witht gilbert menyeis his
mastir and forspekar and complenyeit that Dauy colp hed' stribulit
him and Inuadit him with ane dravin knyf beseking the aldermane
and bailyes of remeid' of lawe according to Justice And thareftir the said'
ministeris of lawe schew that William colp was be cumin borgh' for the
Entiringe of the said' Dauid befor thame the said' day to vnderlie
the lawe and causit Williame scrimgeour officiar cale him diuers' tymes
tile entir the saide Dauid as he that come' Souerte for his Entres'
at the tolbutht wyndew And becaus' the said William nor Dauid'
comperit nocht the said' gilbert humlie besocht the saidez' aldirman and balyes
of remeid' of lawe And Incontinent thareftir thai ordanit the officiaris
Sergeandis quhar euere thai mycht comprehend' the said' Dauy and William
colp tile ask and tak Sufficient Souerte of thame tile entir one Wednisday
the xviij day of the said' Instant september to vndirlie the lawe in
the premiss' befor thame within the said' tolbutht or ellis tile entir thir personis
within the sammyn And the said Williame was in ane amerciament of the
court for the non entres' of the said' Dauy et cetera

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod dominus Andreas coupar est
filius ac legittimus heres quondam Willelmum Coupar

Eeodem die patricius Jhonesone conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Dauid
mar pro perturbio cristinue Walcar et dicta cristina conuicta fuit pro Iniusta
recepcione focalium dictj patricij et quilibet alterj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die patricius reid' deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue dextere ostendum quod
Robertus Walcar erit Indempnis pro patricio Jhonsone aliter quam per viam Juris
Et thomas riddaile deuenit plegius legalis quod Idem patricius erit Indempnis pro
dicto Roberto aliter quam per viam Juris et quilibet ipsorum obligatur ad conseruandum suos
plegios Indempnes

The saide day Androw hatmakar was in ane amerciament of the court
be his awin tounge grant for the strubulance of the court to amend'
as law will and' forber in tyme to cum

The said day the saide androw was hatmakar conuict be ane suorne assis'
Dauid mar forspekar for strubulance of the tovne vnder silence
of the nycht Ande for the brekin of ser androw couparis moder
Durris Ande for the wranguis' Intrometinge of the nychtbouris
gudis of the tovne Ande for the ane wnlauchfull Induellar
of the tovne Ande to dewod' the tovne one friday that nixt
cumis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xviijo die mensis Septembris Anno quo supra

The saide day charlis stevinsone witht gilbert menyes his mastir and'
forspekar complenit that Dauid colp hed' tribulit the saide charlis
ande Inuadit him with ane dravin knyf besekand' the bailyeis of remed'
of lawe the said Dauy accusit denyit the said tribulance And com
plenit one the said' charlis saying he hed' tribulit him besekinge
the saide bailyeis of Justice quhilk the said charlis accusit denyit
Ande Incontinent the said debatis with consent of batht the said partiis was
put to the desicioun of thir personis Jhonne Wormet James Collisone Alexander
gray Williame futhes dauy mag elder Dauy fynne Jhone moir
Jhone blak Jhone of murray Androw steuinsone James kennerty Adam
Wat and Jhone litstar duelland' in Jhonne of cullanis lande
burges of the said' burghe / quhilkis riplie avisit the gret aitht suorn'
the resonis and allegacionis ande previs of baitht the saide partiis schawin
producit and vndirstandin conuict' the said Dauy colp for tribulance of
the saide charlis be the moutht' of James collisone forspekar of the said'
assis' for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court And to
amend as law wile and forber in tyme to cum et cetera And the siad' char
lis was conuikit for tribulance of the said' Dauy colp for the quhilk
he was in ane amerciament of the court And to amend as law wile
and forbeir in tyme to cum et cetera Nocht withtstanding the
of the said tribulance was fundin in the said Dauy becaus he drewe
ane knyf

Eodem die Willelmus gordone piscator conuictus fuit per confessionem lingue proprie
pro perturbio Agnetis traile Cuj emendabit vt Jura volunt Insuper pro
emenda diliberata fuit per assisam ex ore patricij reid' prelocutoris eiusdem quod
Idem Willelmus soluet dicte Agnetj ij s' inde vj d' in donec
persoluatur And gif he tribulis ony persone in tyme to cum and beis
conuict' tharof sale pay xxtj s' to sanct nicholas' werk vneforgevin

Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene' Tenta in pretorio
eiusdem xxiij die mansis Septembris Anno quo supra

Eodem die Dauid Antone conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore patricij leslie
prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Dauid blinseill Cuj emendabit vt Jura volunt

The said day for stanching of the debatis ande hevy expens' that has
bene of lang tyme sustenit betuix the alderman bailyeis counsaile
and communite of the said burgh' warnit be the hand bell throwe
the haile tovne ande gaderit ande thar nychtbour louit nychtbour'
mastir Androwe Caidiowe tueching his clame of the proffitis
of ane half nethis fischinge of the Raik It is finaly appontit agreit
and concordit with the said' mastir Androwe in forme ande effect' as
followis that is to say the saidez' alderman' bailyeis counsaile and communite
of Aberdene' for thar party And the said mastir Androw for his party
has renuncit ande be thir presentis renuncis / ale manere summondes
actionis ande questionis movit betuix thame in ony wise Anentis
the said fisching alsueill the principale actionis as ale expensis
ande actionis that may followe tharupoun' Ande neuere in tyme
to cum ony of thame to be herd' in Jugement aganis vtheris tueching
the saide debate And' in speciale the said' mastir Androw of his
propir motiwe renuncis and ourgevis the lettre of assedacioun'
that he has of the sad' fisching of the Raik vnder the commoun'
seill of Aberdene ffor the quhilk Renunciacioun' ande becaus'
It is considirit be the saidez alderman' bailyeis counsaile and communite
that the said mastir Androwe Is of auld natiwe burges ande abill as his
forbearis to serue ande do for the comoun' proffit of the saide burgh Thai
avisitly gaderit in thar tolbuth be ringyng of the said' hand' bell has
grauntit ane lettre of assedacioun' to be maid' vnder thar commoun' seill
in dew forme to the said' mastir Androwe his ayris ande assignez of ane
half nethis fisching of the mydchingill for ale the termes of thar nixt generale
assedacioun' to be maid ande to be entirit in the yeir of god' jM vc and sex
yeris gressum free to be breukit be him and thame and to be disponit for
thame his wtilite and proffit as he and or thai thinkis maist expe
dient without ony manere exactioun or charg excep the yerly maile alanerly
quhatsumeuere the said' mastir Androw his ayris or assignez ples' to
duell or Reman'

The saide day the aldirman ballies Counsale and diuers' of the Communite
gathtreit and present for the tyme grantit and assignit to patry Rede the
first lande burges that euere happinis to be maid' fre to him for
ane manuale buk conuenient for having baptizing and erding to
thar kirk bocht and resauit fra him the day of thir present et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxvijo die mensis Septembris Anno quo supra

The saide day Nichole bevmond' lauchfullie warnit and nocht
Comperit to Ansuer' at the Instance of Johne Kennertj for
the wranguis' Intrometting with ane Cobill quhilk he
hed' in gouernance pertening to Robert blinsell tharfor the
balyeis ordanit gilbert prestone sergeand' to warne him to comper
this day viij dais the ferde day of October' next to cum

div.head: Hede court
div.p:
Curia capitalis balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In
pretorio burgi de Abirdene vltimo die mensis Septembris anno
Domini Millesimo quingentesimo quarto

Eodem die Johannes leslie de Warderis electus fuit in officium
prepositure huius burgi pro Anno Instanti prestito solito Jura
mento

Eodem die Thomas Waus Dauid Steuarte et
patricius leslie electi fuerunt in officium balliuorum huius burgi pro
anno Instanti prestitis Solitis Juramentis

Eodem die Ormundus leslie Willelmus scrimgeour gilbertus prestone
et Andreas nachtj electi fuerunt in officium sergeandorum huius
burgj pro Anno Instanti prestitis Solitis Juramentis et consuetis

Eodem die Accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes malisone
capellanus et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu
octo Solidorum sibi annuatim debito de quadam terra penitus vasta
Jacente infra burgum prenotatum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram Rectoris de Oyne ex australi ex vna et terram
heredum quondam Robertj Cullane ex boreali partibus ab altera et communies vias
regias versus Oriens et occidens Ad quam terram Accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit
in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo stile et Alexandro
litster et Ormundo leslie seriendo

Eodem die Accedens ad barram frater Johannes lame nomine prioris
et conuentus Carmelitarum huius burgi protestabatur pro annuo Redditu decim solidorum
sibi et dictis fratribus debito a longo tempore debito et non soluto de quadam
terra vasta Jacente in vico viridi ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram Jacobj
piot ex occidentali et terram dictorum fratrem ex orientali ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit
in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus testibus Johanne rede Roberto murray
pynor et Ormundo leslie seriendo

Eodem die comparuit dominus Johannes Rede Capellanus prepetuus altaris stancti
Jacobi apostoli infra ecclesiam beati nicholaij de abirdene Cum magistro Andrea
Crafurd' suo prelocutore et protestabatus in form' quod processus productus per
dominum Andream Colisone capellanum super quandam terram vastam quondam dominum
Ingeramj bannerman Jacente in futy non Cedat sibi et dicte Capellane
sue in preiudicium in postrum penes annuum redditum xl denariorum monete
Scocie sibj annuatim de eadem debito

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus andreas collisone capellanus altaris sancti stephani
infra ecclesiam parrochiali sancti nicholaij de Aberdene situati et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditus vj s' et
octo d' vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta
quondam henricj Rany iacente in futy inter terram heredum quondam Willelmi Rany ex australi ex vna et terram
quondam Willelmi Westland' ex boreali partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos balliui in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam 3o die huius processus testibus
Willelmo syme Donaldo baxter et gilberto prestone sergeando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes arnot minister
domus sancte trinitatis de Abirdene protestans in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu
xl denariorum vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicte' domuj ec conuentui eiusdem annuatim
debito de quadam terra penitus vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in futy inter terram
quondam Alexandri Westlande ex australi ex vna et terram quondam Willelmum menyes
ex boreali et Communionem viam regiam ex occidentali extenden' in longitudine ad maris fluxum fuit
arenas versus oriens Ad quam terram Accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus
Testibus

div.head: Leslie prepositus
div.p:
Burgenses et fratres gilde facti tempore prepositure Johanis leslie de Warderis anno Domini
millesimo quingentesimo quarto
Alexander findelausone ad Instanciam dominum de Drvm Recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde prestito Solito Juramento et Soluet v s' in alba bursa
Johannes Scrogis Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento
et Soluet v s' in alba bursa ut morum est
Alexander Steuart stewart recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento et
Soluet xx s'
Willelmus blakhale de eodem recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito
Juramento et Soluet v s' in alba bursa
Andreas lammynto carnifex Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito
Juramento et Soluet v s' in alba bursa
Johannes herowne recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Soluet xl s'
et prestito Solito Juramento
Johannes Colly allutarius recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento et
Soluet v s' in alba bursa
Johannes brekly vitrator ad requestum domini nostri Regis Episcopi Recipitur in
liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento
